src_original: rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la/_/rgyal ba'i sku ni rims bzhin bzhugs/_/dang po sku'i rdo rje ni/_/gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhugs/_/rjes su chags
tgt_original: vajrācāryasya kāye'smin  kramaṃ kāyajinasthitaḥ |  prathamaṃ kāyavajreṇa  rūpaskandhena saṃsthitaḥ |  anurāgaṇavajreṇa

src_original: ni/_/'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/mched pa kun gyi rdo rje ni/_/
tgt_original: vedanāskandhena saṃsthitaḥ |  vāgvajreṇa bhagavān  saṃjñāskandhena saṃsthitaḥ | (42)  sarvapūjana vajreṇa

src_original: 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/bcom ldan thugs kyis rdo rje ni/_/rnam
tgt_original: cittavajreṇa bhagavān  vijñānaskandha sthito [ ' ] py asau ||

src_original: shes phung por yang dag bzhugs/_/'di'i sha sogs sa khams la/_/bcom
ldan yum chen spyan ma bzhugs/_/dro ba la sogs me khams la/_/bcom ldan
tgt_original: bhagavatī locanā sthitā ||  śoṇitādijaladhātur  bhagavatī māmakī sthitā |  uṣṇāditejodhātur

src_original: yum chen gos dkar mo/_/skyod pa la sogs rlung khams la/_/bcom ldan yum

chen sgrol ma bzhugs/_/gsher ba la sogs chu khams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje ma ma ki/_/de bzhin sku'i khams rnams la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// yul lnga rnam par dag pa las/_/mchod pa'i lha mo lnga ru gyur/_/de'i mig gi
dbang po gnyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i snying /_/de'i rna ba'i dbang gnyis la/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rdor bzhugs/_/de'i sna la bzhugs pa
tgt_original: netradvayendriyaṃ tasya  kṣitigarbhas tathāgataḥ | (43)  śrotradvayendriyaṃ tasya

src_original: ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam snying po/_/de'i lce la bzhugs pa ni/_/de
bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang /_/khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni/_/
'du shes bya bar rtags pa la/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i/_/de
bzhin gshegs pa de na bzhugs/_/de yi yid kyi dbang po la/_/de bzhin
tgt_original: lokeśvaras tathāgataḥ |  manasi sthitam indriyaṃ tasya  mañjughoṣas tathāgataḥ |

src_original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang /_/lus kyi rtsha rgyus thams cad la/_/de
tgt_original: sarvasandhi śarīrasya  samantabhadras tathāgataḥ | (44)  sarvasnāyuḥ śarīrasya

src_original: bzhin gshegs pa byams pa bzhugs/_/lag pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/
de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed/_/lag pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/
de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub/_/kha'i pad+mar bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa rta mgrin no/_/gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa bdud rtshi 'khyil/_/dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/_/dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i rgyal/_/pus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin
gshegs pa stobs po che/_/rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los sgyur/_/rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa
tgt_original: nīladaṇḍas tathāgataḥ |  mahābalas tathāgataḥ |  cakravarttī tathāgataḥ |  sumbharājas tathāgataḥ |

src_original: gnod mdzes so/_/lus kun de dag kun la yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa
tgt_original: samaste caiva kāye'smin  sarva tathāgatāḥ sthitāḥ |

src_original: dpa' nyid kyi lus/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs
pa/_/mya ngan 'das la bzhugs par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa myur du thob//
khyed kyis dge ba yongs su smin/_/de bas rdo rje slob dpon ni/_/mthong na
